bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
Test case from here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4604>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4604</denchmark-link>
Output differs vs. same model saved/loaded with model serializer.

comments.comment:
So this had nothing to do with serialized models - this was actually an edge case for workspaces with scalars. Fixed here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/nd4j/pull/2600>deeplearning4j/nd4j#2600</denchmark-link>
Test that reproduces the problem added here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4611>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4611</denchmark-link>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
